name: Grappling with Faith
description:
A game about fun, floaty smooth grappling hook action, using only two buttons. There is technically a finish line to reach but really this is a prototype about exploring motion... and about me figuring out a grappling hook engine.

This game was made for a 1 game 1 week class with the weeks theme of "two buttons two colours".

controls:

(with no grapple out):

hold left control to rotate aim anti clock wise

release left control to launch grapple hook (this will propel you a little.)

hold right control to rotate aim clock wise

release right control to launch grapple hook.

(while grapple hook is out)

hit left or right control to destroy grapple hook.

please enjoy and let me know what you think in the comments.
